sentences.english: Do not forget those who have been wrongfully accused by the Republic and died refusing to close their eyes.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘記那些被共和國誣衊而死不瞑目的人們。

sentences.english: The newspaper editorial defamed the politician.
sentences.chinese: 該報社論誣衊這名政治家。

sentences.english: They both ratify and stigmatize certain behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 他們都批准和誣衊某些行爲。

sentences.english: But I also do not want people to vilify .
sentences.chinese: 但希望我也別給人誣衊。
